==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ご|ち|そう|さま|yomi=ok}}

===Etymology===
[[御]] + [[馳走]] + [[様]]

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ごちそうさま}}

# a [[feast]]

===Usage notes===
Normally only said as part of the expression [[御馳走様でした]] ''gochisōsama deshita'', used after eating to show one's appreciation for the meal.
